title: which one would you choose and why

comments.body:
i just realised i too have to vote to see the results  
forgot to put an option for people that just wanna see :')

Do you have a branch preference? If yes then pick that. If you are okay with any branch, weigh the pros and cons of each Uni, along with other factors (placements, cost, travel etc) and see which works out best for you. Additionally, remember to factor in higher education plans if any while making this decision.
I mean for this I feel u should go with ur choice of the branch... I mean do u like ece even?? Or cse for that matter?
If you've a branch preference go with your branch but if that doesn't matter ,choose manipal main campus anyday.

i think i might have a slight pref towards cse but i'm not really sure, for the most part i like ece and cse equally and the biggest reason i'd prefer cse would be cuz it apparently has higher packages and all that?  
so placements and packages was what i wanted to know more about in this aspect ig  


thanks a lot tho
yup, i kinda like both and i have pretty much the same interest for both, so i wanted to know about the other parts ig

i don't exactly have a set branch preference so there's that  
also could you elaborate  why you'd think manipal is better, is it because of the peer group or placements and packages or anything else  


thanks

I've got friends in Manipal and their life is way better than mine , the campus , crowd , events and really vast alumni network and even if PESU might do slightly better in placements which i doubt, I'd say choose college life over depression.
There's a post on this sub which contains the stats for the 2023 batch, you can refer to that

ohhh okay i see  
that was informative, thanks a ton

alright i'll search for that  
thank you
going through the same dilemma lmao
